Showcase all 4 shape kinds: rectangle, ellipse, line, arrow. The arrow element is rotated 15 degrees.

elements.content: Four shape kinds with configurable fill, stroke, border radius, and opacity.

slides.notes: Math rendering with KaTeX — inline and display modes.

elements.content: Inline math: the quadratic formula $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$ renders in text flow.

slides.notes: KaTeX matrix examples — various delimiters, operations, and linear systems.

elements.content: Block math with `$$...$$` — matrices, determinants, and linear systems.

**Matrix Multiplication**

$$\begin{pmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} e & f \\ g & h \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} ae+bg & af+bh \\ ce+dg & cf+dh \end{pmatrix}$$

**Eigenvalue Problem**

$$A\mathbf{v} = \lambda\mathbf{v} \implies \det(A - \lambda I) = 0$$

$$\det\begin{vmatrix} a-\lambda & b \\ c & d-\lambda \end{vmatrix} = 0$$

**SVD Decomposition**

$$A = U\Sigma V^T = \begin{bmatrix} u_1 & \cdots & u_m \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} \sigma_1 & & \\ & \ddots & \\ & & \sigma_r \end{bmatrix} \begin{bmatrix} v_1^T \\ \vdots \\ v_n^T \end{bmatrix}$$

elements.content:
Supports **100+ languages** via Shiki.

Select a TikZ element and click **Render** in the property panel.

slides.notes: TikZ advanced diagrams — neural network, finite automaton, and commutative diagram.

elements.content: Neural networks, automata, and commutative diagrams — all rendered client-side.
Select each TikZ element and click **Render** in the property panel to compile.

slides.notes: Video embedding: YouTube iframe + native local video with controls.

elements.content: Supports YouTube, Vimeo, and native video files (MP4, WebM).

slides.notes: onEnter animation effects: fadeIn, slideInRight, scaleIn, slideInUp, typewriter, fadeOut, scaleOut.

elements.content: All effects auto-play when the slide loads.
This text uses the **typewriter** effect with a 1-second delay.
Enter **presentation mode** (F5) to see animations. In editor, elements are static.

slides.notes: onClick animation with order grouping. Click/Space to advance through 3 steps.

elements.content: Press **Space** or **click** to advance. Same `order` values play together.

Click count:
**0** → Step 0 (A+B)
**1** → Step 1
**2** → Step 2
**3** → Next slide

slides.notes: New trigger types: withPrevious (simultaneous), afterPrevious (chained), onKey (keypress). Press 'q' for Step 2.

elements.content: **onKey "q"** — this appears when you press Q (or Space/Arrow also works)
Timeline: **click** → blue + green (simultaneous) → yellow (auto-chains) → **click** → purple → **press q** → pink → next slide

slides.notes: This slide uses a 'slide' transition. Previous slides use 'fade'. Transition types: fade, slide, none.

elements.content: This slide entered with a **slide** transition (500ms). Most others use **fade** (300ms).

slides.notes: Custom background color overrides theme. Demonstrates per-slide background, rotation, verticalAlign options. Transition: none (instant).

elements.content: This slide has a **custom background** (#1a1a2e) overriding the theme default. Transition: **none** (instant).

**Deck-level theme** sets defaults:
- text: fontSize 18, color #1e293b
- code: fontSize 14, borderRadius 8
- shape: borderRadius 8

Element `style` overrides theme.

**Text style properties:**
fontFamily, fontSize, color,
textAlign (left/center/right),
lineHeight, verticalAlign (top/middle/bottom)

slides.notes: Table element — structured data with headers, striped rows, and theme-aware styling.

elements.content: Structured data with headers, configurable borders, and optional striped rows.
Add/remove rows and columns in the **Property Panel**. PPTX export is supported.

slides.notes: Table with inline LaTeX — math expressions rendered via KaTeX inside table cells.

elements.content: Inline math expressions are rendered inside table cells using `$...$` syntax.
Use `$...$` inside any cell — supports **bold**, *italic*, and `code` too.
All element types, animations, transitions, and styling options covered.
